#
# May 11 2011, Christian E. Hopps
#
# Copyright (c) 2013 by cisco Systems, Inc.
# All rights reserved.

# XxX.... or
# Xx<desc>X....
#
# desc is the string to label the match in the table
# x is literal and x is one of:
#
# A - address (ipv4 or ipv6)
# I - interface name
# F - floating point number
# H - hex number
# M - mac address
# N - number
# R - newline requires
# P - prefix address (ipv4 or ipv6)
# p - parenthesis - match value inside parens
# S - non-space
# T - time (00:0:00)
# W - word
#
# or XXX<regex>XXX... or
# or XXX<regex><desc>XXX...
#
# regex is a regular expression
# desc is the string to label the match in the table

OS: NXOS

SHOWCMD: show ip pim group-range
PREFIX: pim4-group
ACTUAL:

PIM Group-Range Configuration for VRF "default"
Group-range        Action    Mode      RP-address       Shared-tree-only range
232.0.0.0/8        Accept    SSM       -                -
238.0.0.0/24       ASM       -         192.168.0.1      -
239.0.0.0/24       ASM       -         192.168.0.1      -

MARKUP:
PIM Group-Range Configuration for VRF "XQ<vrf>Xdefault"
Group-range        Action    Mode      RP-address       Shared-tree-only range
XP<group>X232.0.0.0/8 +XS<action>XAccept +XS<mode>XSSM +XS<rp>X- +XR<strange>X-

SHOWCMD: show ipv6 pim group-range
PREFIX: pim6-group
ACTUAL:

PIM6 Group-Range Configuration for VRF "default"
Group-range               Mode      RP-address          Shared-tree-only range
ff3x::/32                 SSM       -                   -

MARKUP:

PIM6 Group-Range Configuration for VRF "XQ<vrf>Xdefault"
Group-range               Mode      RP-address          Shared-tree-only range
XP<group>Xff44::/120 +XS<mode>XASM +XS<rp>X192::3 +XR<strange>X 

SHOWCMD: show ip pim interface
PREFIX: pim-intf

ACTUAL:

# For IPv6 the address format chagnes and PIM is PIM6

Ethernet2/2, Interface status: protocol-up/link-up/admin-up
  IP address: 13.13.13.1, IP subnet: 13.13.13.0/24
  PIM DR: 13.13.13.1, DR's priority: 1
  PIM neighbor count: 0
  PIM hello interval: 30 secs, next hello sent in: 00:00:09
  PIM neighbor holdtime: 105 secs
  PIM configured DR priority: 1
  PIM border interface: no
  PIM GenID sent in Hellos: 0x1bb71fa2
  PIM Hello MD5-AH Authentication: disabled
  PIM Neighbor policy: none configured
  PIM Join-Prune inbound policy: none configured
  PIM Join-Prune outbound policy: none configured
  PIM Join-Prune interval: 1 minutes
  PIM Join-Prune next sending: 1 minutes
  PIM BFD enabled: no
  PIM passive interface: no
  PIM VPC SVI: no
  PIM Interface Statistics, last reset: never
    General (sent/received):
      Hellos: 6031/0 (early: 0), JPs: 0/0, Asserts: 0/0
      Grafts: 0/0, Graft-Acks: 0/0
      DF-Offers: 0/0, DF-Winners: 0/0, DF-Backoffs: 0/0, DF-Passes: 0/0
    Errors:
      Checksum errors: 0, Invalid packet types/DF subtypes: 0/0
      Authentication failed: 0
      Packet length errors: 0, Bad version packets: 0, Packets from self: 0
      Packets from non-neighbors: 0
          Packets received on passiveinterface: 0
      JPs received on RPF-interface: 0
      (*,G) Joins received with no/wrong RP: 0/0
      (*,G)/(S,G) JPs received for SSM/Bidir groups: 0/0
      JPs filtered by inbound policy: 0
      JPs filtered by outbound policy: 0o

MARKUP:

XIXEthernet2/2, Interface status: XXX<[^/]+><proto_status>XXXprotocol-up/XXX<[^/]+><link_status>XXXlink-up/XR<config_status>Xadmin-up
  IP address: 13.13.13.1, IP subnet: 13.13.13.0/24
  PIM DR: XA<dr_addr>X13.13.13.1, DR's priority: XN<dr_pri>X1
  PIM neighbor count: XN<nbr_count>X0
  PIM hello interval: XN<hello_int>X30 secs, next hello sent in: XT<next_hello>X00:00:09
  PIM neighbor holdtime: XN<nbr_hold>X105 secs
  PIM configured DR priority: XN<config_dr_pri>X1
  PIM border interface: XWXno
  PIM GenID sent in Hellos: 0x1bb71fa2
  PIM Hello MD5-AH Authentication: XWXdisabled
  PIM Neighbor policy: XRXnone configured
  PIM Join-Prune inbound policy: XRXnone configured
  PIM Join-Prune outbound policy: XRXnone configured
  PIM Join-Prune interval: XRX1 minutes
  PIM Join-Prune next sending: XRX1 minutes
  PIM BFD enabled: XRXno
  PIM passive interface: XRXno
  PIM VPC SVI: XRXno
  PIM Interface Statistics, last reset: never
    General (sent/received):
      Hellos: 6031/0 (early: 0), JPs: 0/0, Asserts: 0/0
      Grafts: 0/0, Graft-Acks: 0/0
      DF-Offers: 0/0, DF-Winners: 0/0, DF-Backoffs: 0/0, DF-Passes: 0/0
    Errors:
      Checksum errors: 0, Invalid packet types/DF subtypes: 0/0
      Authentication failed: 0
      Packet length errors: 0, Bad version packets: 0, Packets from self: 0
      Packets from non-neighbors: 0
          Packets received on passiveinterface: 0
      JPs received on RPF-interface: 0
      (*,G) Joins received with no/wrong RP: 0/0
      (*,G)/(S,G) JPs received for SSM/Bidir groups: 0/0
      JPs filtered by inbound policy: 0
      JPs filtered by outbound policy: 0o
